teams.name: Savannah Country Day School Kiva Kids
teams.loan_because: We loan because we want to empower our neighbors around the world to improve their lives. We hope to learn about them, their culture and customs, and to better understand ourselves in the process.
teams.description: Savannah Country Day School strives to cultivate in each student the desire and the discipline to grow in wisdom, to lead lives of personal honor, to appreciate beauty, to pursue physical well being, and to serve others with a compassionate and generous spirit.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.description: We are Buddhists of all variety, but focus here is on the way of the Boddhisatva.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: viSIon Against Poverty
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce the need for young girls to fall into the hands of people traffickers.
teams.description: We are members of Soroptimist International of Gold Coast, Australia and one of our objectives is "Eliminate poverty and gender discrimination through ensuring women’s full social and economic rights"

teams.name: Kiva Kiwis
teams.loan_because: Because Kiwis know what it is to pull yourself  up by your bootstraps.
teams.description: Started in Oamaru New Zealand by a group of friends wanting to encourage and to make it easy for Kiwis to make loans through Kiva.

teams.name: Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All
teams.loan_because: 2.6 billion people, or 40% of the world, lack access to basic sanitation. The resulting disease causes nearly 2 million deaths, 10% of the global disease burden, and $84 billion in worker productivity loss each year. The high population density combined with the lack of infrastructure and resources makes the problem particularly acute in slums, where populations will double to 2 billion by 2030. Kenya is at the epicenter of this crisis with 10 million people living in slums, 80% of whom lack access to basic sanitation.
teams.description:
Members of Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All enjoy seeing Sanergy's Fresh Life Operators receive loans for, and operate their Fresh Life Toilet businesses in Kenya.

Sanergy promotes the fundamental human right to sanitation in the slums of Kenya by increasing access to and usage of hygienic sanitation facilities. Sanergy creates an efficient, equitable, and sustainable sanitation cycle by building a dense network of small-scale sanitation centers across the slums, a low-cost containerized waste collection infrastructure, and converting this waste at a central processing facility into electricity, fertilizer, and other high-margin products.

Sanergy is an official Kiva field partner.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All
teams.loan_because: 2.6 billion people, or 40% of the world, lack access to basic sanitation. The resulting disease causes nearly 2 million deaths, 10% of the global disease burden, and $84 billion in worker productivity loss each year. The high population density combined with the lack of infrastructure and resources makes the problem particularly acute in slums, where populations will double to 2 billion by 2030. Kenya is at the epicenter of this crisis with 10 million people living in slums, 80% of whom lack access to basic sanitation.
teams.description:
Members of Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All enjoy seeing Sanergy's Fresh Life Operators receive loans for, and operate their Fresh Life Toilet businesses in Kenya.

Sanergy promotes the fundamental human right to sanitation in the slums of Kenya by increasing access to and usage of hygienic sanitation facilities. teams.name: Finland
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Finland

teams.name: Himeji Dokkyo University KIVA Course
teams.loan_because: We want to show how simple actions here can have an impact on others around the world.
teams.description: The members are students at the university learning about KIVA in a topic study course. They focus on issues they can play a role in changing, fair trade of products and other social issues.

teams.name: KINKI University - Business Writing Team
teams.loan_because: we want to show that choices that are made here in Japan can have an impact on the lives of people around the world.
teams.description: We are a group of economics majors who are focusing on business writing through the world of KIVA. We learn about loan applications, business letters and emails by taking on roles of borrowers, microfinance organisations and KIVA.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Savvy Network Marketing Women
teams.loan_because: We know that by helping women gain financial independence through a business, we raise up their families, their communities and create a powerful shift on the planet.
teams.description: We are a global group of female entrepreneurs transforming our lives - and the lives of others - by building our own successful businesses.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Alpha Kappa Psi
teams.loan_because: In short; we love to help people. As a part of the foundation on which our fraternity stands, service is incredibly important to us. Donating our time to assisting others makes us incredibly happy, and we hope to create great opportunities with everyone involved in our lending.
teams.description: Alpha Kappa Psi is recognized as the premier developer of principled business leaders. We stand with our core values of brotherhood, unity, service, knowledge, and integrity. With Kiva we hope to empower those less fortunate, and create great opportunities for everyone involved in communities around the world.

teams.name: Zepheira
teams.loan_because:
With the successes that grow out of good work come greater possibilities to work for good. We at Zepheira embrace the responsibilities attendant to the resources at our disposal by partnering with proven, focused humanitarian organizations. Our corporate charitable program includes regular financial support as well as innovations in giving that stem from our corporate strengths.

Despite differences in our individual backgrounds, we have all come to recognize the great amount of good that can be done with a modicum of well-placed effort, and we see how some of the world’s problems continue to deteriorate, not for want of proven solutions but instead for lack of attention: not enough funds, personnel, or will to change. We want to give our attention to be part of building a better world, and so our association with one another necessitates looking beyond our client work into the needs of the wide world around us, needs that cannot be ignored.
teams.description: Zepheira is a global team of technologists interested in begin part of building a better world through our work and our investments.

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Physical Therapists
teams.loan_because: We know the importance of giving people the tools to help themselves

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Scott's Team
teams.loan_because: We care
teams.description: Dedicated

teams.name: MyHoodooSpace Team Light
teams.loan_because:
"Poverty is not an accident. Like slavery and apartheid. it is man made and can be removed by the actions of human beings." - Nelson Mandela

We believe in empowering the individual because faith without works is dead. "He who is kind to the poor lends to the Lord and he will repay him for his deed." Proverbs 19:17. 

We loan because giving makes us happy and shifts our energy into a receptive mode. Giving makes you feel good and attracts more Good to you! Thus we open the Universal Vault of Plenty not only for others, but for ourselves too! "Give, and it shall be given unto you." - Jesus
teams.description: We are an egregore of world wide spiritual practitioners who believe in love and walking in the Light toward our brothers and sisters. We do unto others as we would have it done unto us. This is our Golden Rule. Join us and let your Light shine.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Becky's Hugs
teams.loan_because: Becky was unfailingly generous during her short life (2001-2010).  She loved freely and without limit, and never met anyone she considered to be a stranger.  She was always ready with a hug for anyone who needed one, even when they didn't know it yet.  Loaning Becky's memory keeps her love alive, spreading her love around the world!
teams.description:
We are a group of people who have been inspired by the love of a young lady named Becky, who was tragically killed 30 August 2010 at the age of 9½.  She loved unconditionally, and was always ready with a hug, even for complete strangers.  The living memorial of sharing hugs began immediately after her death, when her mother told her classmates to hug each other every day in her memory.  This team keeps Becky's love alive by sharing her hugs in the form of loans around the world.

To learn more about Becky and the impact of her short life, visit BeckysHugs.com, which will point you to the Becky's Hugs page on Facebook.  Look at the photos and videos to get a better idea about who Becky was, and check out the timeline to see the ways in which people have celebrated her memory and love.

Hugs to you!

We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.name: Independent Video Game Developers
teams.description: We are indie game developers -- people who make freeware or shareware games that aren't funded by large publishers. Please join if you're an indie developer or even if you just like playing indie games.

teams.name: The American Dream
teams.loan_because: We want to spread the American dream.
teams.description: Teaching people that the American dream doesn't have to only happen in America.

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Jeffco Productions
teams.loan_because: It's fun!
teams.description: We're a group of like-minded people who enjoy having fun and helping other people. Please, feel free to join us!

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: AIESEC Alumni and Members
teams.loan_because: Once an AIESECer, always an AIESECer!
teams.description: We are current and former members of the international student organisation AIESEC (the world’s largest student-run organization)

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?
